description: This super easy asparagus recipe is full of flavour. The tangy capers and mustard dressing is so versatile you can use it on chicken, seafood or steak.
keywords: Saut√©ed vegetable,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Oct 2021,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Asparagus,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Charred Asparagus With Caper & Mustard Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
0.25 bunch continental parsley, leaves picked, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Spray a large chargrill pan with oil and heat over high heat. Cook asparagus, in batches, turning, for 5 minutes or until tender. Transfer to a plate. Cover to keep warm.
Meanwhile, place mustard, zest, lemon juice and olive oil in a small bowl and whisk to combine. Season with pepper. Stir in remaining ingredients. Serve asparagus topped with caper dressing.
